# Miles Per Gallon App

In the Analyzer tab, you can see the correlation between different variables and the MPG.  Select a radio button on the left navigation pane, then click the Plot button.  The plot of the variable selected will be shown with its relation to MPG in the main window.

In the Predictor tab, you can alter 4 different variables and see the impact to predicted MPG.  The inital values are the mean of the variables in the mtcars dataset.  To predict MPG, you can enter values for the 4 variables on the left navigation pane, and the click the Predict button.  The resulting MPG will be shown in the main window.
